remarks: If a lattice translation is not the identity, then there is an atom not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` and not equal to its translation. (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrneq.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrneq.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrneq.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrneq.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrneq.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnnid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ F =/= ( _I |` B ) ) -> E. p e. A ( -. p .<_ W /\ ( F ` p ) =/= p ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d F p $.
$d H p $.
$d K p $.
$d T p $.
$d W p $.
